english.segment1: I Can't Forget Your Smile These Days. I Miss You So Much. But I'm Here You're There Now. I Can't Forget Your Tender Smile. Smiling's Enough. To Bring Me Home Again
english.segment2: If I Had One Wish. You'd Be Here With Me. So Please Don't Forget. This Trips Bittersweet. I'll Write Home Soon
english.segment3: I Can't Forget Your Smile These Days. Smilings Enough. To Bring Me To My Knees
english.segment4: If I Had One Wish. You'd Be Here With Me. So Please Don't Forget. This Trips Bittersweet. I'll Be Home Soon. Home Soon
english.segment5: I Can't Forget Your Smile. Haven't Seen It In A While. But I'm Here You're There Now. The Days Are So Slow Now
